description: Construction of second floor side extension; construction of roof terrace and addition of privacy screening to the south elevation
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):  200-010 Rev 05 (existing location plan), 202-100 Rev 05 (existing floor plans), 203-100 Rev 05 (existing front and rear elevations), 203-101 Rev 05 (existing side elevation), 401-101 Rev 01 (proposed site plan), 402-100 Rev 07 (proposed floor plans), 403-100 Rev 07 (proposed front and rear elevations), 403-101 Rev 07 (proposed side elevation), 200-050 Rev 03 (site photos - sheet 1), 200-051 Rev 03 (site photos - sheet 2), 200-052 Rev 03 (site photos - sheet 3).

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).

| Prior to use of the roof terrace hereby approved, the privacy screening identified in the approved drawings listed under condition 2 shall be installed and retained for the lifetime of the development.

Other than the roof terrace identified in the approved drawings listed under condition 2, no part of the roof shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft Local Plan (Regulation 19).
